prompt.title: Location extractor
prompt.description: Analyze the provided text to extract any mention of a address, district, city, country or continent, adhering to a strict interpretation of the text.

task.step: Identify and extract (a) addresses, (b) district names, (c) cities, (d) countries, (e) continents and (f) landmark explicitly mentioned in the text
Print all items that you identified
Capture the surrounding context for each identified item
Categorize the items under the catgories address, district, cities, countries and continents
Present findings in structured JSON format with no comments or annotations in the JSON object.

example.text: A group of tourists traveled from Sydney, Australia. They also made a stop at the Eiffel Tower in Paris, France. During their journey, they stayed at the Hilton Hotel, 123 Main Street, Los Angeles, California, USA. Their itinerary included a brief visit to the district of Brooklyn in New York City. Later, they enjoyed a scenic tour of the European continent. But the enjoyed Los Angeles the most.

output_format.template: I found the items: ... ```json { "address": ["List of dictionaries with 'items' and 'context' keys], "district": ["List of dictionaries with 'items' and 'context' keys], "city": ["List of dictionaries with 'items' and 'context' keys], "area": ["List of dictionaries with 'items' and 'context' keys], "country": ["List of dictionaries with 'items' and 'context' keys] "continent": ["List of dictionaries with 'items' and 'context' keys], "landmark":["List of dictionaries with 'items' and 'context' keys], }

guidelines.point: Extract only explicitly mentioned locations-no assumptions or inferences.
The JSON object must be accurate, complete, and contain no comments or annotations.
The value of the 'context' keys are lists of all possible context in which the item was found.
